body_html:
@rmlarsen , @drpngx : Already after creation of this PR I made a bunch of even more useful changes in this operation in my local repository:

  • Added support for back propagating gradients for this operation.
  • Optimized it to allow compute indices incrementally - that speed up it 2.5 times (single-thread version).
  • Made possible split this operation across mutliple threads - that make it work even faster on modern multi-core CPU.

Since this review, unfortunately, is not approved yet, I have a question: What is the better way of contributing my improvements? Should I push them all in this PR so all of them will be reviewed simultaneously, or it is better to wait for this PR to be approved and then make another one?
